original_text: And when the sun was going down, a deep sleep fell upon Abram; and, lo, an horror of great darkness fell upon him.
korean_text: 해 질 때에 아브람에게 깊은 잠이 임하고 큰 흑암과 두려움이 그에게 임하였더니

sentences.original_text: And when the sun was going down
a deep sleep fell upon Abram
and, lo, an horror of great darkness
